title: Create English speaking practice app with teacher functionality

requirements.text: Create a user interface for English speaking practice sessions where learners can view conversation prompts and practice speaking exercises
acceptanceCriteria: Display conversation prompts clearly on screen
Provide a clean, distraction-free interface for speaking practice
Show different types of speaking exercises (e.g., pronunciation, conversation, storytelling)

requirements.text: Implement teacher/instructor functionality that allows viewing and managing student speaking practice sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Teacher can view list of students and their practice activities
Teacher can access student speaking practice records
Clear separation between student and teacher views

requirements.text: Store speaking practice session data including exercise prompts, completion status, and timestamps in the backend
acceptanceCriteria: Practice sessions are persisted with unique identifiers
Each session tracks the exercise prompt and completion status
Sessions are associated with specific users

requirements.text: Create a library of English speaking exercise prompts covering different proficiency levels and topics
acceptanceCriteria: Include beginner, intermediate, and advanced level prompts
Cover various topics such as daily conversations, professional scenarios, and descriptive exercises
Prompts are stored in the backend and retrievable by the frontend

requirements.text: Design a creative, engaging visual theme with warm, educational aesthetics that encourages language learning, using colors and typography that feel welcoming and motivating for learners of all ages
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme is consistent across all pages and components
Color palette and typography create a friendly, educational atmosphere
Layout promotes focus and reduces cognitive load during practice sessions

nonGoals: Real-time voice recording or speech recognition
Video calling or live teacher-student interaction
Integration with external language learning APIs

required: Friendly teacher illustration with welcoming expression for homepage hero section (teacher-hero.dim_800x600.png)
Simple microphone icon for speaking practice button (microphone-icon.dim_64x64.png)
Book and speech bubble illustration for learning sections (learning-illustration.dim_400x300.png)
